## Decision.setIndex() method

Sets the index for this decision. Once set, index is immutable.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setIndex(index: number): Result<DecisionIndex>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The index to set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[DecisionIndex](./ts-res.decisionindex.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the new index if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
